alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Palos Verdes Hills; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Lucia Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 1:47PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Areas of northwest to north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph expected. Local gusts to 50 mph below passes and canyons. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
